php.LBL_PL_VAT_PAYER_DESC: The service allows you to verify whether the entity is an active, exempt, or unregistered VAT taxpayer in Poland.
php.LBL_GUS_DESC: Download information about entities of the national economy of Poland from the REGON Registry.
php.LBL_VIES_DESC: Checks if the business entity has a valid VAT-EU number for intra-community transactions within the European Union.
